question: What is a hackathon?
answer: MEGA Hackathon 2023 is a weekend-long event where hundreds of students from around the world come together to work on cool new software and/or hardware projects targeting the United Nations 17 Sustainable Development Goals.

question: When and where is MEGA Hackathon 2023?
answer: MEGA Hackathon 2023 is from April 14-16, 2022. Feel free to attend virtually, but if you are in the New Jersey area we encourage you to attend in person!

question: How long is the event?
answer: MEGA Hackathon 2023 is a weekend-long 24-hour Hackathon plus a day of workshops.

question: Am I eligible to attend?
answer: Everyone is able to attend, from middle schoolers to professionals in the industry.

question: What are the hackathon tracks/themes?
answer: Our hackathon is based on the United Nations 17 Sustainable Development Goals: this year, the tracks are Good Health and Well Being, Quality Education, Climate Action, Zero Hunger, and Clean Energy. The top team in each track will win a prize.

question: What if I don't have a team?
answer: Don't worry! There will be team formation opportunities before the hackathon. Feel free to send a message out in the team-finding channel in our discord: https://discord.gg/FCKPZnWmyd.

question: I have more questions!
answer: Reach out to us at megahackleague@gmail.com!
